name: QuestBrick
description:
My first ever published game!

This is a simple brick breaker game. The twist: it has you moving back and forth between levels to collect items and open up various parts of the levels.

It still needs many improvements and tuning. If you do try it out, please leave some feedback, it will be greatly appreciated :) I intend to gradually make it much better.

All arts and music credits go to various open source artists. If they're yours, please don't get mad, I'll add proper credits in-game shortly :)

Only Windows and French for now. Love to everyone though!
